titles.title: For God Who Commanded The Light To Shine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For God who commanded the light to shine,
Out of darkness, has shined in our hearts, in our hearts,
To give the light of the knowledge of the glory,
Of God in the face of Jesus Christ.
But we have this treasure in earthen vessels.
That the excellency of the power,
May be of God and not of us.
For God who commanded the light to shine
Out of darkness, has shined in our hearts.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Porque Dios me mandó su luz a las tinieblas
Brilla ahora en nuestro /corazón,/
Para darnos la luz del conocimiento
De la gloria de Dios en Cristo Jesús
Y tenemos este tesoro en vasos de barro
Para que la excelencia del poder, sea Dios, solo de El
Porque Dios que mandó su luz a las tinieblas
Brilla ahora en nuestro corazón.
